page.syntax: FILEFIND as C = Filefind.List_New_Files(C path ,C pattern [,C datestring [,C timestring [,C am_pm ]]])

argument.name: pattern
argument.description: A pattern to select file names using wildcard characters like ?*' and ?? '.

argument.name: datestring
argument.description: Optional. Default = Today. The date on or after which the file was modified. Note: The date must be in MM/DD/YY format.

argument.name: timestring
argument.description: Optional. Default = None. The time on or after which the file was modified.

argument.name: am_pm
argument.description:
Optional. Default = None. Enter one of the following strings.
"AM",
"PM"

page.description: Scan folders and sub-folders for all files updated after date/time specified by datestring and timestring. If datestring and timestring are not specified, then files modified today are returned.

section.description: The FILEFIND.LIST_NEW_FILES() method recursively searches folders and sub-folders and returns a list of files that match a pattern that were modified on or after a specified date and time.
section.example: dim lst as C dim cnt as N lst = filefind.List_New_Files("c:\\", "*.txt", "3/1/03") cnt = line_count(lst) ? cnt = 38.000000
